title: Corpse Pose
description: Readers will bend over backward for the debut of the first yoga mystery series.Ever since her husband ditched her-for another man-A.J. hasn't exactly been on the road to inner peace. Then her yoga-guru aunt is found dead, and A.J.'s named the sole heir to her lucrative yoga studio-making her a multimillionaire, a prime suspect, and the killer's next target.
author: Diana Killian
